INSERT INTO t_group ( ID, PGROUPID, GROUPNUM, GROUPNAME, GROUPTYPE, BACKUP_STATU, BACKUP_TIME, BACKUP_REASON, CREATOR, CREATENAME, CREATETIME, DEPARMENTCODE, LASTUPDATETIME, DELETEFLAG )
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.grouptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backupStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.backupReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deparmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.deleteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_group
PGROUPID = #{pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPNUM = #{groupnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPNAME = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GROUPTYPE = #{grouptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP_STATU = #{backupStatu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACKUP_TIME = #{backupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BACKUP_REASON = #{backupReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATENAME = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEPARMENTCODE = #{deparmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTUPDATETIME = #{lastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETEFLAG = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_group WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and rownum = 1

select g.*, (select count(1) from T_AJGROUP t1 where t1.groupid=p.id and t1.deleteFlag=0) as caseNum, (select count(1) from T_USERGROUP t2 where t2.groupid=p.id and t2.deleteFlag=0) as crewNum from T_GROUP g where g.deleteFlag=0 and g.pgroupid=#{pgroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
